overview: As Vice President of Systems Development at the Chicago Mercantile Exchange, Mr. Wagner managed a staff of over 100 employees and ran multi-system support and development for one of the largest futures exchange and clearing house in the world. He served as Chief Software Architect at Mortgagebot, where he oversaw software application development. Mr. Wagner was Chief Technology Officer of HyperFeed Technologies, Inc. and Chief Information Officer of Equitec Group LLC, designing and implementing technology infrastructure for their global offices.
